verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Despite its losses on the battlefield in Iraq and Syria] , [ARG1: the Islamic State] [V: remains] [ARG3: a grave national security threat] , [ARGM-ADV: according to the Trump administration and terrorism experts] . That mixed news was brought home just last week .
